data.name: Colosseum VR
data.detailed_description:
Visit the Colosseum

Find out how this ancient monument came to be, in all its glory and eventual downfall. You'll be led on a narrated journey that outlines the perilous history of both Rome and the Colosseum, realities of both gladiators and citizenry. How they lived, how they died, it is for you to learn.


Take it all in

From magnificent exteriors to never-before-seen interiors with decorated hallways, you'll stand face to face with ancient gladiators and learn what made them the legendary fighters that we remember today. See this symbol of Rome and its glorious past with your own eyes.

Welcome, to the Colosseum!
data.about_the_game:
Visit the Colosseum

Find out how this ancient monument came to be, in all its glory and eventual downfall. You'll be led on a narrated journey that outlines the perilous history of both Rome and the Colosseum, realities of both gladiators and citizenry. How they lived, how they died, it is for you to learn.


Take it all in

From magnificent exteriors to never-before-seen interiors with decorated hallways, you'll stand face to face with ancient gladiators and learn what made them the legendary fighters that we remember today. See this symbol of Rome and its glorious past with your own eyes.

Welcome, to the Colosseum!
data.short_description: Come and visit the Roman Colosseum! This guided tour will take you through its rise and downfall, bring you face to face with gladiators, and allow you to experience the glory of roman architecture like never before. Welcome!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Czech*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: i5-6500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
